content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future actions of the French Academy or its leaders. However, it is likely that the institution will continue to face pressure from critics and the public to adapt to changing social norms and attitudes. The French language and culture are continuously evolving, and the Academy may need to adjust its policies and practices to remain relevant and effective. It is possible that the Academy will take additional steps towards inclusivity and modernization in the future, but it is ultimately up to its members and leaders to determine their priorities and direction.
